refnamediv.refpurpose: Generate a vector with initial values.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Generate a vector (one-dimensional k-rate array) with a sequence of numeric or string values.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ival1,...ivaln -- values to place in the vector.
In the second form the answer array must be pre-declared, and it may be a multidimensional array which if filled in row-major order.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: In the third form the vector is regenerated at k-rate with values kval1,..., kvaln.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the fillarray opcode. It uses the file fillarray.csd.
Example of the fillarray opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
